Text: Worked great on configurable usb loader. Thanks a lot

Works great! I was having a hard time getting past "please insert your disk screen" Found this guide: http://www.wiihacks.com/wii-games/100307-dkcr-donkey-kong-country-returns-guide.html and changed the IOS in settings to IOS249 and it works! Thank you HobbitGamez!
